comment:
* Stores the references of all the RemoteViewsFrameLayouts that have been returned by the
     * adapter that have not yet had their RemoteViews loaded.

methods.name: public void add(int position, RemoteViewsFrameLayout layout)
methods.comment: * Adds a new reference to a RemoteViewsFrameLayout returned by the adapter.

methods.name: public void notifyOnRemoteViewsLoaded(int position, RemoteViews view)
methods.comment:
* Notifies each of the RemoteViewsFrameLayouts associated with a particular position that
         * the associated RemoteViews has loaded.

methods.name: public void removeView(RemoteViewsFrameLayout rvfl)
methods.comment: * We need to remove views from this set if they have been recycled by the AdapterView.

methodNames: public void add(int position, RemoteViewsFrameLayout layout)
public void notifyOnRemoteViewsLoaded(int position, RemoteViews view)
